MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.04am. Our engineers have arrived at the McFarlane Place substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:03am on Sunday, 06 December 2020
